headline: 3 Stocks With Mouthwatering Dividends You Can Buy Right Now
summary: AbbVie is a Dividend King with a strong product lineup.  Bristol Myers Squibb offers a high dividend yield and has underrated growth potential.  Pfizer's dividend and underlying business are safer than they might seem at first glance.
